description: The Dwarf Red Pygmy Japanese Maple (Acer palmatum 'Red Pygmy') is an amazing addition to any garden with its captivating beauty. Its deep reds and purples make up its beautiful foliage, perfect for adding excitement and color to any landscape. Its small size and easy maintenance make it an ideal choice for even the smallest of gardens. It's the perfect size for small enclosures, patios, and paths and can remain evergreen in the winter months. The tree is slow-growing, making it long-lasting and resilient in the face of disease, extreme weather conditions, and pests. Enjoy the beauty of the changing colors year round and the umbrella-shaped canopy which provides much-needed shade, with this remarkable little tree.
